title: AI stock gains boost California revenue by $11 billion
description: A surge in artificial intelligence stock prices has boosted California’s tax collections by about $11 billion, yet the state’s deficit is still on track to swell to about $18 billion next fiscal year, officials said.
content:

title: North Dakota’s Grand Farm Earns Another $7 Million in State Funding
description: North Dakota is investing $7 million into Grand Farm to promote research on robotics, artificial intelligence, and other technology for autonomous agriculture.
content:
By Jeff Beach
North Dakota is investing $7 million into Grand Farm to promote research on robotics, artificial intelligence, and other technology for autonomous agriculture.

title: Amazon to invest $15 billion in Indiana to boost data center infrastructure
description: Amazon.com is planning to invest about $15 billion in Northern Indiana to build data center campuses, the tech giant said as it looks to boost its cloud computing capacity to support booming artificial intelligence demand.
content:
The new data center project, which comes on top of an $11 billion outlay announced last year, will add 2.4 gigawatts of capacity in the region, Amazon said on Monday. It is also expected to create 1,100 jobs.

title: Armenia Secures Key U.S. Approval for $500 Million AI Supercomputer Hub
description: Armenia's $500-million artificial intelligence and supercomputer hub project, developed by Firebird with government collaboration, has moved forward after US regulators approved the transfer of advanced Nvidia chips following a personal appeal from Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan.
content:
An Armenian $500-million initiative to develop an artificial intelligence and supercomputer hub has taken a major step forward after US regulators approved the transfer of advanced Nvidia chips.

title: Epic CEO: "RAM price increases will be a real problem" — as OpenAI et al. blow up RAM prices, threatening affordability of everything from Xbox to TVs and laptops
description: Microsoft, OpenAI, and other artificial intelligence proponents are using tax payer subsidies to blow up the price of RAM, and by extension, practically all consumer tech.
content:

title: Alphabet races toward US$4 trillion valuation
description: Alphabet closed in on a US$4 trillion valuation on Monday, set to become only the fourth company to enter the exclusive club, as the Google parent rides an artificial intelligence-driven rally.
content:
